StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDescendentRecrui.ngOrgs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [Parent] ,[Decendent] as Descendent FROM [mcriss].[USMC].[vwDecendentRecrui.ngOrgs] order by parent, descendent desc FOR XML PATH('DescendentRecrui.ngOrg'), ROOT('DescendentRecrui.ngOrgs')
